name: NetTalon
overview:
NetTalon is securing its place as the global industry standard for delivering “emergency management information” to first responders.

NetTalon’s Virtual Command Technology will save lives and minimize the loss of property and resources worldwide. Our mission is to become a world-class provider in the Fire and Security Systems business with a superior emergency management monitoring and response system which will establish a new paradigm for incident management capabilities.

milestones.description: LSU - Fire & emergency Training Institute Test NetTalon System 3000
milestones.source_description: Impact of Perfect Information, Fire Engineering, Dec 2005 pages 89-92.

milestones.description: City of Baton Rouge Virtual Fireground/Incident Command Technology Demonstration
milestones.source_description: A Live Demo Shows Off Incident Planning Technology, Edwin Smith, Fire Chief Baton Rouge, Fire & Life Safety, FS-10 May 2007

milestones.description: Active Shooter Demonstration, May 29-30, 2008, Baton Rouge, LA
milestones.source_description: High Tech Security System Tested, Baton Rouge Advocate Article, May 28, 2009
